page.name: Bassault's Assault
page.description: Drakath has called in a favor with the Pyromancer Xan. His firey armies are taking positions all around Falconreach, but a huge lava creature named Bassault is not waiting.

properties.name: Bassault's Assault
properties.description: Drakath has called in a favor with the Pyromancer Xan. His firey armies are taking positions all around Falconreach, but a huge lava creature named Bassault is not waiting.
properties.complete: You have bested Bassault, the minion of Xan. Maybe some clue to the war plans of the pyromancer can be found.
